oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Ridge
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: John Ridge, a Cherokee interpreter, sitting at a desk. He is writing with a feather quill pen.
John Ridge, the son of Major Ridge, served as an interpreter, secretary, and agent who helped with negotiations for several delegations to Washington.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Ridge, John, 1803-1839
